question: How do I earn points?
answer: You can earn points easily by completing daily tasks, taking surveys, watching video ads, and discovering new games or apps listed in our 'Tasks' section. Each task has a specific point value displayed next to it.

question: How do I redeem my points?
answer: Once you reach the minimum withdrawal threshold, go to the 'Wallet' section. Choose your preferred payment method (like PayPal, Gift Cards, etc.), enter your details, and submit the request. Payouts are usually processed within 24-48 hours.

question: Why didn't I get points for a task?
answer: This usually happens if you didn't complete all steps of the offer, or if you have previously installed the app on your device. Please ensure you follow the instructions exactly and allow tracking permission if asked.

question: Is my personal data safe?
answer: Absolutely. We take your privacy seriously and use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. We do not sell your personal information to third parties. For more details, please review our Privacy Policy.

question: Can I have multiple accounts?
answer: No, creating multiple accounts is strictly prohibited. Our system detects duplicate accounts based on device ID and IP address. Doing so may result in a permanent ban and forfeiture of points.

question: What is the referral program?
answer: You can earn bonus points by inviting friends! Share your unique referral code found in the 'Invite' section. When your friend joins and completes their first task, you both get a bonus.

question: My withdrawal is pending, what do I do?
answer: Most withdrawals are processed within 24 hours, but sometimes it may take up to 3 business days depending on the payment provider. If it takes longer, please contact support.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: If you have any issues that aren't answered here, you can contact us directly via the 'Contact Us' button in the settings menu or email us at support@genrwin.com.
